trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref> objects that are the cells of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow"></xref> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.CellControlCollection> class represents the collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow> control.

<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects can be added at the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.CellControlCollection> collection with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.CellControlCollection.Add%2A> method or at a specified index location in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.CellControlCollection> with the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.CellControlCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
Only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> objects can be added to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.CellControlCollection> collection.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.CellControlCollection"></xref> collection.
The added control can be only a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.CellControlCollection"></xref>.
The added <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> must be of the type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>.
Adds the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> object to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.CellControlCollection"></xref> collection.
The new control is added to the array at the specified index location.
The added control can be only a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell> object; otherwise, an <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown.
The location in the array to add the child control.
The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> to add to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableRow.CellControlCollection"></xref>.
The added <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> must be of the type <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableCell"></xref>.
